title: Notes on a Spatial Architecture
excerpt: Finally building out my mental model on a flavor of spatial neural accelerator that is good for CNNs (not for transformers).

title: DSOTM
excerpt: I beg you, listen to it.

title: You.
excerpt: What is "you", and where does it reside? The information filter which you've acquired through a lifetime of experience. The sum of all the things you've seen, heard, felt, and thought boiled down into a lens which weaves together preconscious stimuli into the world-model you uniquely inhabit.
